channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google will now let you pick your top sources for search results
item.description: Google will let you define the top sources to get more stories from those sites.

item.title: Best Kids Backpacks, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Your kid's little lunch hauler takes a brutal beating every day. These are the ones our own kids have tried and loved.

item.title: Inside the ‘Whites Only’ Community in Arkansas
item.description: Members have espoused racist and antisemitic views and repeatedly praised Adolf Hitler and the Nazi party. They've raised hundreds of thousands of dol...

item.title: 11 Best Computer Speakers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested computer speakers, from stereo speakers to surround sound, will suit any budget.

item.title: Uber Freight CEO Lior Ron leaves to join self-driving startup Waabi as COO
item.description: Self-driving truck maker Waabi has hired autonomous vehicle industry veteran and Uber Freight CEO, Lior Ron, to step in as chief operating officer, as...

item.title: Australian court finds Apple, Google abused app store market power
item.description: Epic Games has just secured a win in its crusade against Apple and Google's app store policies: The Federal Court of Australia on Tuesday ruled that A...

item.title: Data Brokers Are Hiding Their Opt-Out Pages From Google Search
item.description: Dozens of companies are hiding how you can delete your personal data, The Markup and CalMatters found.

item.title: TDK backs Ultraviolette with $21M to take India-made electric motorcycles global
item.description: Ultraviolette aims to expand its electric motorcycles to 40 European countries, as well as Latin America and Southeast Asia.

item.title: Cloud vs. Local: What’s the Best for Security Camera Footage? (2025)
item.description: With home security cameras and smart doorbells, video storage is crucial. But do you go cloud or local? We compare the options.

item.title: How a once-tiny research lab helped Nvidia become a $4 trillion-dollar company
item.description: Nvidia's research lab developed the technology that took the company from a video game GPU startup to a $4 trillion-dollar company.
